description: A low rank angel who appears as Asmo is attacking Rika, she tries to stop him but after their battle, they both become injured and unable to fight. After Asmo`s retreat, Luvriel becomes unconscious and is taken to Naoto`s house. After regaining consciousness, she explains the situation to Rika and Naoto and says that Asmo will attack again but she is weakened and unable to fight, so, as a replacement for herself, she transforms Rika into a Devil Angel. Also, despite Luvriel`s childish appearance, and occasionally actions, she is in fact 10,009 years old.
name: Tenshi Luvriel
